snippet: The Badger, the last coal-fired ferry in the United States, will have to sink or sail on its own.
abstract: S S Badger, last coal-fired ferry in United States, will have to shut down after provision is taken out of Coast Guard bill in the House that would have allowed the ship to continue running--and burning ash--on Lake Michigan.
lead_paragraph: The Badger, the last coal-fired ferry in the United States, will have to sink or sail on its own.

headline.main: Bad News on Capitol Hill for Last Coal-Fired Ferry
headline.print_headline: Bad News On Capitol Hill For Last Coal-Fired Ferry
